name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.56
lastChange: Standardized quest interactions across all views with a unified pop-up. Added a 'To-Do' system for prioritizing Ventures, which now also appear in calendars. Revamped the Chronicles view for clarity and fixed numerous UI bugs.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
